scripts.pretest: `npm bin`/eslint lib/*js test/*js && babel --presets es2015,stage-2 -d lib-test lib
scripts.precoverage: mv .babelrc babelrc && rm -rf lib-cov && `npm bin`/babel-istanbul instrument --es-modules --output lib-cov lib && mv babelrc .babelrc
scripts.coverage: export COVER=true && export ISTANBUL_REPORTERS='text-summary' && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mocha-istanbul
scripts.precoveralls: npm run precoverage && rm -rf lcov* && export COVER=true && export ISTANBUL_REPORTERS='lcov' && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mocha-istanbul
